content:
{"name": "St. Camillus Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The food is distributed from the building across the parking lot from the church and that is connected to the St. Francis International School building. People enter/exit the doors directly under the big blue sign that reads: 1500 St. Camillus Drive. 

Everyone gets a food pantry card that allows them to receive every 4 weeks.

Newcomers are registered and given a card the first time they come. All recipients must be registered.

Clients must be at least 18 years of age and can show us some form of personal ID (driver's license, passport, home country ID... ) something with their name and date of birth.

Each time they come, they need to bring ID and Pantry card which gets scanned and the distribution recorded in our system.

There can only be 1 card per family, so husband and wife cannot each have a card, for example.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.stcamillusfoodpantry.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1500 Saint Camillus Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Silver Spring", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20903", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.010519, "longitude": -76.982956}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 960-8903", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
